name: Minion (muupi)
description:
A mini game jam submission! This is my second game jam.

This first build has plenty of juicy bugs I need to fix asap and I super appreciate all of your feedback to help me spot anything that's been overlooked.

One of the mini games (holding the down arrow and letting go) speed is a snail crawl on build. Not sure why! Please, take a complimentary doodle for your sorrows.
